attributes.title: THE DONALD TRUMP APP PARALYZED ME!!
attributes.review: I was going about my day, feeling good and having fun, then my father suggested I download the Donald Trump app. Seriously. Now, I was hesitant but figured there'd be some laughable content. The MOMENT I open the app, I fall to the ground, completely paralyzed. Worst experience of my life, 0 stars.
